extendedInfo.description: *** WHAT'S INSIDE THE MYSTERIOUS TAMAGO EGG!? *** One thing is for sure, you will not be disappointed! But do you really have what it takes to get this cool, purple, EGGstraordinary Tamago egg open....? 1 MILLION TAPS - Come on, what are you waiting for? Start tapping already ;) Tamago Eggstraordinary is the most exciting free TAMAGO game you will ever find. Tap Tap Tap that Tamago egg until it cracks open piece by piece....Try it now and you're in for a surprise of a lifetime! Or maybe you're even in for double or triple the fun.... No-one knows how many presents that are waiting for you inside the tamago egg! Tap, drill and do everything you possibly can to get that cool, mysterious egg open! This game is perfect to tap your time away during any occassion. Waiting for someone or something is not boring anymore when you have this fun, free tapping game to play on the go! The game features amazing weapons, sunny explosions and a very catchy backgroundd tune, all to maximise your game experience! Tap away and a fantastic surprise is waiting for you to be discovered. You can open the tamago egg by tapping with your finger or by using different tools. Choose between Sticks, Drills & even Magic Bombs! Highlights: â¢ Hours of tapping fun â¢ Eggstraordinary Retina graphics â¢ Funny sound effects â¢ Friendly HAPPY music â¢ Incredibly addictive This is the most fun you'll ever have playing a FREE tamago click one million time game! Don't hesitate and download what could be the best free monster game on the store...Try it out now, your efforts will be rewarded in a very generous way..... IF you manage to get that tamago egg open! Are there tamago monsters waiting for you inside, or are there other incredible, unbelievable presents... open it to find out! This is the best and most fun free kids game on android!
